name: Laravel (Codespaces)
postCreateCommand: cp -n .env.example .env && composer install && php artisan key:generate && npm install && npm run build && sed -i "s|^APP_URL=.*|APP_URL=https://$CODESPACE_NAME-80.app.github.dev|" .env && sed -i "s|^VITE_APP_URL=.*|VITE_APP_URL=https://$CODESPACE_NAME-5173.app.github.dev|" .env
